<align=center><color=#00FF00>Hotfix 13.2: Fixed Daily Leaderboard</color></align>

Just a hotfix for the daily leaderboard - it ran out of space, sorry.

<align=center><color=#00FF00>Update 13.1: Don't Get Lost</color></align>

Added a poster in the homebase explaining the map. And quite a few smaller improvements.

title: New Visuals
description:
<align=center><color=#4275f5>Update 13: New Visuals</color> - October 2024</color></align>

We added tons of <color=#FF9F80>new visuals, effects and animations</color> in all areas of the game. We've re-worked the Mobile Malware <color=#335fff>EMP Chips</color> for better balancing and further improved the <color=#ffea46>Grenade Launchers</color> and Explosion Chips.

See build notes for full details. Enjoy!

<color=#ffea46>Your support means a lot:</color>
• Feedback - it helps us make a better game
• Roadmap - details on upcoming updates
• Discord - come chat with us and like-minded players
• Reviews - If you enjoyed the game, please leave a positive review, it helps a lot.

title: Update 12
description:
<align=center><color=#4275f5>Update 12.1: Final Boss 2.0</color> - September 2024</color></align>

We revamped the <color=#FF9F80>final boss</color> from the ground up. We're also celebrating an <color=#ffea46>incredible 3 years</color> of updates since launch. Thanks for all your support!

See build notes for full details. Enjoy!

<color=#ffea46>Your support means a lot:</color>

title: Update 11
description:
<align=center><color=#4275f5>Update 11: Quality of Life</color> - August 2024</color></align>

<color=#FF9F80>New Trainee Mode</color> and <color=#ffea46>Improvements</color> in Collisions and Physics, Class Balancing, Weapon Feel, Teleportation, Chip Usage, Level Layouts and tons more.

See build notes for full details. Enjoy!

title: Update 10
description:
<align=center><color=#4275f5>Update 10: Resurrection</color> - May 2024</color></align>

<color=#ad42f5>Visual Overhaul</color>, <color=#f54242>Boss Revamp</color>, Improved <color=#42f554>Weapon Recoil</color>, <color=#ffea46>Unstuck Button</color>, 100's of smaller improvements.

Check the new <color=#42f5d7>Graphic Settings</color> Menu!
See build notes for full details. Enjoy!
